item.title: Stock market shuttered as ruble crashes...
item.description:
www.cnn.com
Russia's currency crashed to a record low against the US dollar Monday as the country's financial system reeled from crushing sanctions imposed by Western countries in response to the invasion of Ukraine.

item.title: Finland and Sweden to join NATO?
item.description:
apnews.com
HELSINKI (AP) — Finland and Sweden have brushed off warnings from neighboring Russia that their possible joining of NATO would trigger “serious military-political consequences” from Moscow for the two countries.

item.description:
thehill.com
Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky has emerged as a hero to his nation's citizens and far beyond as the former actor and comedian first elected in 2019 remains in his country at great personal risk during its bombardment by Russia.

item.title: NUKE CRAZY!
item.description:
apnews.com
